congratulations.title: Congratulations!
congratulations.description: Looks like you have managed to complete every problem that exists so far! Make sure to check back in a while to see if new challenges have been added :)

failure.title: Wrong :(
failure.description: Unfortunately that was not the correct answer! Click here to go back to the problem.

invalid.title: Oops!
invalid.description: Looks like the problem index you entered is not valid!

success.title: Great work!
success.description: You managed to figure out the correct answer! Click here to go to the next problem.

welcome.title: Welcome to Programmer Quest!
welcome.description:
Hello there! Glad to see that you stumbled across Programmer Quest :) This website contains a series of programming challenges centered around a fictional MMORPG. Throughout the challenges you will journey through this MMORPG, while hopefully learning a thing or two along the way. Enjoy!

To get started, click here

(or you can go to the list of all problems)
